body: The monster's name is presented first, along with its challenge rating (CR), its mythic rank (MR), and three icons you can use to quickly identify the creature's role in the game. The monster's CR already factors in the CR increase it gets for having mythic ranks.
url: pfsrd://Mythic Adventures/Rules/Mythic Monsters/Reading a Mythic Monster Stat Block/Name/CR/and MR
name: Name, CR, and MR
